drupalNodeEvent.title: Off the Beaten Track: Cool Tools for Online Teaching

field_organizers.processed: Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Reischauer Institute of Japanese Studies

field_description.processed: The second East Asian digital scholarship community hour will start at 7:30 PM EST on 13 January 2021. The theme is "Off the Beaten Track: Cool Tools for Online Teaching." So far, we have flash presentations about mmhmm (https://www.mmhmm.app), Gather (https://gather.town), and Congregate (https://www.congregate.live). If you want to share your magic tools for online teaching, please fill in this Google Form (https://link.ws/EADSCH-Present) by 11 January 2021. The community hour will be recorded and posted on the Fairbank Center YouTube Channel.
